Soal 1
1021+1022+1023+…+3018+3019+3020 = ?
Jawaban:

a=1021
b=1
Un=3020

Un   = a+(n-1)b
3020 = 1021+(n-1)1
3020 = 1021+n-1
3020 =  1020+n
3020 – 1020 = n
2000 = n
n = 2000

Sn = n/2(2a+(a+Un)
Sn = 2000/2(a+Un)
Sn = 1000(1021+3020)
Sn = 1000(4041)
Sn = 4041000

maka:
1021+1022+1023+…+3018+3019+3020 = 4041000
